description.gold-silver:
An attack that
may cause a burn.
description.crystal:
An attack that
may cause a burn.
description.ruby-sapphire:
A fiery blast that scorches
all. May cause a burn.
description.emerald:
Incinerates everything it
strikes. May cause a burn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The foe is hit with
an intense flame.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

It may also leave the
target with a burn.
